Overall, this is a pretty good game. I played the first one, and when I found out there was a second one, I immediately downloaded it. It said ‚ÄúBigger maps‚Äù and ‚ÄúMore Figs‚Äù which is actually great, and all true. But since there are bigger maps, it means there‚Äôs more people to battle (along with the legion of doom) and so you can level up much quicker, with the highest level only being 20, just like the last game. Already 2 of my figs are level 20 and I haven‚Äôt even seen Superman yet. This really needs to change, because it also means I can‚Äôt get my power up as much as some of the other cpus, and if there‚Äôs a fig I really love (Black Lightning for me) and I get it to level 20, there isn‚Äôt much I can do with it since it‚Äôs fully enhanced as well. Please please please pay attention to this whoever the developers are and make it go higher!
